segments.text: Now I see what the children are up to on the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing precariously on a two-step stool in front of an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, with splayed and tilted legs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR" inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems he's successfully grabbed some cookies, his hand is inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Beside him, a girl stands with one arm raised, palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up expectantly, clearly waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their coordinated mischief is quite a sight to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can imagine the crash if that wobbly stool were to finally tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder they haven't been caught yet in this daring act.
segments.speaker: PAR
